      • toMinimumByte

        public static String toMinimumByte(long bytes,
                                   SizeUnitType type)
        change byte to minimum size
        From: stackoverflow

        Beware: this method call support until SizeUnit.EB only because of Long.MAX_VALUE

        Parameters:
        bytes - number of bytes
        type - type of unit
        Returns:
        string format %.1f
